name: Downstairs Hallway
longDesc:
You are in the downstairs hallway.
The front door is on the south wall.
It opens to the porch, which is outside.
On your right, on the west wall, there is a door that leads to the dining room, but not the living room.
The only way to get to the living room is through the dining room. On your left, on the east wall, there is a door for the kitchen, and the family room.
There is a pantry in the kitchen but you it can only be accessed through the kitchen.
By the front door, there is a shoe tray.
On the floor at the south wall, right by the front door, is a pile of mail.
There is a letter with a clue for the password to their parents'c omputer on one of the envelopes.
description:
You are in the downstairs hallway.
The front door is on the south wall.
It opens to the porch, which is outside.
On your right, on the west wall, there is a door that leads to the dining room, but not the living room.
The only way to get to the living room is through the dining room.
On your left, on the east wall, there is a door for the kitchen, and the family room.
There is a pantry in the kitchen but you it can only be accessed through the kitchen.

mail.name: mail
mail.description: There is a large pile of mail by the front door at the end of the hallway.

shoe tray.name: shoe tray
shoe tray.description: You're supposed to put muddy shoes on the tray, but there aren't any there right now.
shoe tray.discoveryStatement: The only thing on the shoe tray today is an umbrella.

umbrella.name: umbrella
umbrella.description: The umbrella is orange and blue and very large.

skateboard.name: skateboard
skateboard.description: This is your mom's skateboard. She left it in the middle of the hallway AGAIN!
